task.title: Create an Access Policy
task.shortdesc: Create a new access policy on the Access Policy Builder page.

prereq.p: Before you can create an access policy you must configure the following:

ul.li: User authorizations How do I configure user authorizations?
Data visibilities How do I configure data visibilities?

taskbody.context: To create a new access policy, define one or more access rules:

step.cmd: Open the Access Policy Builder page, by clicking the Access Policy Builder icon in the left navigation bar.
step.info: The Access Policy Builder page opens.
The form for the new access policy opens, with Rule 1 ready for you to edit.

chdesc.p: Mandatory. The user authorizations allowed to perform the action on the data. User authorizations are configured for the system by the administrator.
Mandatory. The action(s) an authorized user may take on the data. Supported actions are as follows:

ul.li: Read. The user may view the data.
Export. The user may export the data to a destination, such as a SAP system.

chdesc.p: Mandatory. The data visibilities authorized users are allowed to access. Data visibilities are configured by the administrator.

step.cmd: Add another rule by clicking the Add Rule button. Or, save the access policy by clicking the Save Access Policy button. The system confirms when the access policy has been successfully saved.
